title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil in the win32 version of the software uses the Class.forName() method in a specific line of code.
EB: The BidiUtil in the win32 version of the software should not use the Class.forName() method in the mentioned line of code.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BidiUtil source code in the win32 version of the software.
2. Locate the line of code that uses the Class.forName() method.
3. Change the line above to 'static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);'.
4. Save and rebuild the software.
5. Verify that the software functions as expected without any errors or issues.
